name: Lay's
description: A leading brand in potato chips with a wide range of flavors.

name: Tropicana
description: Famous for its high-quality fruit juices, especially orange juice.

name: Doritos
description: Known for its flavored tortilla chips, especially nacho cheese.

name: Danone
description: A multinational food-products corporation known for its dairy products.

name: Yoplait
description: A popular brand offering a wide variety of yogurt flavors.

name: General Mills
description: Known for popular cereal brands like Cheerios and Wheaties.
